marytts.util.data
Class MaryHeader

java.lang.Object
  marytts.util.data.MaryHeader

public class MaryHeader
extends java.lang.Object

Common helper class to read/write a standard Mary header to/from the various Mary data files.

Author:
sacha

Constructor Detail

MaryHeader

public MaryHeader(int newType)
Consruct a MaryHeader from scratch. Fundamental guarantee: after construction, the MaryHeader has a valid magic number and a valid type.

Parameters:
newType - The type of MaryHeader to create. See public final constants in this class.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input type is unknown.

MaryHeader

public MaryHeader(java.io.DataInput input)
           throws MaryConfigurationException
Construct a MaryHeader by reading from a file. Fundamental guarantee: after construction, the MaryHeader has a valid magic number and a valid type.

Parameters:
input - a DataInputStream or RandomAccessFile to read the header from.
Throws:
MaryConfigurationException - if no mary header can be read from input.

MaryHeader

public MaryHeader(java.nio.ByteBuffer input)
           throws MaryConfigurationException
Construct a MaryHeader by reading from a file. Fundamental guarantee: after construction, the MaryHeader has a valid magic number and a valid type.

Parameters:
input - a byte buffer to read the header from.
Throws:
MaryConfigurationException - if no mary header can be read from input.

peekFileType

public static int peekFileType(java.lang.String fileName)
                        throws java.io.IOException
For the given file, look inside and determine the file type.

Parameters:
fileName -
Returns:
the file type, or -1 if the file does not have a valid MARY header.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be read

             throws java.io.IOException
Mary header writer

Parameters:
output - The DataOutputStream or RandomAccessFile to write to
Returns:
the number of written bytes.
